channel.title: How to host my webclient?
channel.description: Hey guys iv got my webclient html page made and the signed jar file i just need to know how to host my webclient. i currently have a premium webhost i just need to know how to host it. i put both files together in the same folder in the webhost but when i try loading it. it says "error, click for details" or what ever. its like it cant find the jar file?? how do i get this running??? on website there is a button u click. then it opens up the webclient page. heres the website link to have a look and try it so u see my problem (not advertising) www.violentpkz.com and here is a small bit of the website code im using to redirect people to the webclient html when the button is clicked. http://gyazo.com/a81e2a30d1db4de5c171c4bdad50035a

item.title: How to host my webclient?
item.dc:creator: @Dr_Jig Dr Jig
item.description:
@Dr_Jig wrote:

Hey guys iv got my webclient html page made and the signed jar file i just need to know how to host my webclient. i currently have a premium webhost i just need to know how to host it. i put both files together in the same folder in the webhost but when i try loading it. it says “error, click for details” or what ever. its like it cant find the jar file?? how do i get this running??? on website there is a button u click. then it opens up the webclient page. heres the website link to have a look and try it so u see my problem (not advertising) www.violentpkz.com and here is a small bit of the website code im using to redirect people to the webclient html when the button is clicked. http://gyazo.com/a81e2a30d1db4de5c171c4bdad50035a
